Parameters.Name: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION – JPEG RESOLUTION (ALL RESOLUTIONS)

Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION – JPEG RESOLUTION (ALL RESOLUTIONS)
Test.Name: Profile is found: profile with required VEC exists
Test.Description: Correct response(except streaming). Annex A.14 checking: GetProfiles contains profile with required VEC (token="0"). This profile contains required encoding. GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptionsResponse message contains specified video encoding for the first profile.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RTSS-1-1-24 VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION – JPEG RESOLUTION (ALL RESOLUTIONS)
STEP 1 - Getting media service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Media service Media service address: http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Getting video encoder configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

STEP 5 - Getting media profiles Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check if the DUT returned any profiles STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get video encoder configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Select profile for test Use profile with token '0' STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Get video encoder configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Validate JPEG options STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Setting video encoder configuration Configuration token = 0 Configuration name = user0 Configuration encoding = JPEG Frame rate = 30 Width = 720 Height = 480 Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Getting video encoder configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Check that the DUT accepted values passed STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Get Stream URI Transmit done Receive done Stream URI = rtsp://192.168.10.203/encoder1 STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Init Environment STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - DESCRIBE STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Open Stream STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Checking filters Known Video Decoder used: MJPEG Decompressor Known Video Processor used: Color Space Converter Recommended Video Renderer used: Video Renderer STEP PASSED

STEP 21 - Wait Stream Verifying resolution... Requested resolution: 720 x 480 Detected resolution: 720 x 576 Verification failed! STEP FAILED
STEP 22 - Stop Thread STEP PASSED
STEP 23 - TEARDOWN STEP PASSED
STEP 24 - Setting video encoder configuration Configuration token = 0 Configuration name = user0 Configuration encoding = JPEG Frame rate = 30 Width = 40 Height = 80 Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED

Test.TestName: VIDEO ENCODER CONFIGURATION – JPEG RESOLUTION (ALL RESOLUTIONS)
Test.Name: Profile is found: profile with required VEC exists
Test.Description: Correct response(except streaming). Annex A.14 checking: GetProfiles contains profile with required VEC (token="0"). This profile contains required encoding. GetVideoEncoderConfigurationOptionsResponse message contains other video encoding for the first profile. Check that encoding is JPEG in SetVEC
